satisfaction.label: How was this process for you?

easy.label: According to the following answers, what suits you best:

options.label: The process was easy to complete
The process was neither easy nor difficult to complete
The process was difficult to complete

comprehension.label: What did you think of the language used?

options.label: Neither easy nor difficult to understand
I lacked information before starting the process
The site did not display well on mobile
There was a lack of information about the progress of my request or process (timeline, etc.)

difficulties_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other difficulties you encountered?

contact.label: Did you try to contact the assistance service for the process?

contact_channels.label: By what means did you try to contact the process service?

contact_channels_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other means you tried to contact the service?

contact_details.label: Were you able to reach them?

options.label: I did not find how to contact them
I contacted them but could not reach them
I contacted them and they responded to me

contact_satisfaction.label: How was the interaction with the process service?

help.label: Did you need additional help for this process?

options.label: I searched on the internet (site, forum)
I asked for help from a close person (family, friend)
I asked for help from an association

help_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other help you needed?

verbatim.label: Do you want to tell us more?
verbatim.hint: Do not provide any personal information here. This is not a contact form. If you have questions about this process, contact the relevant service.
